DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not therapy was administered as part of a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category.
